bot.name: Agora
global.error.insufficient_perms:
**You are missing the permissions to complete this action.**

_If you believe this is a mistake, please contact server staff!_
perms.feature_embed.desc: Allows users to use the /embed command
perms.feature_channels_voice.desc: Allows users to create custom voice channels
perms.feature_channels_text.desc: Allows users to create custom text channels
perms.feature_channels_unlimited.desc: Allows users to bypass the channel creation limit for the channel creator feature
perms.feature_channels_buttons.desc: Allows users to paste buttons for creating voice/text channels into a channel
perms.feature_rules_mod.desc: Allows users to modify the guild-rules
perms.feature_tickets_view.desc: Allows users to see tickets and send messages in them
perms.feature_activities.desc: Allows users to use the activities feature
perms.feature_activities_manage.desc: Allows users to manage the activities feature
feature.settings.command.desc: Modify the settings of the different features of this bot
feature.settings.command.error.no_voice: The channel passed must be a voice channel!
feature.settings.command.channel.desc: Modify the settings of the 'Channel' module
feature.settings.command.channel.max_voi: The maximum amount of voice channels a user can create
feature.settings.command.channel.max_tex: The maximum amount of text channels a user can create
feature.settings.command.channel.voice_c: The category to put newly created voice channels into
feature.settings.command.channel.text_ca: The category to put newly created text channels into
feature.settings.command.channel.join_to: Add a voice channel that when joined moves every user into their own
feature.settings.command.tickets.desc: Modify the settings of the 'Tickets' module
feature.settings.command.tickets.open_ca: The category newly created tickets will be put in
feature.settings.command.tickets.saved_c: The category tickets will be put in when saved
feature.settings.command.welcome.desc: Modify the settings of the 'Welcome' module. Variables: $user, $user_icon
feature.settings.command.welcome.channel: The channel where welcome messages should be sent in
feature.settings.command.welcome.title.d: Set the title of the welcome message (Variables: $user, $user_icon)
feature.settings.command.welcome.descrip: Set the description of the welcome message (Variables: $user, $user_icon)
Set the footer of the welcome message (Variables: $user, $user_icon)
feature.settings.command.welcome.thumbna: Set the thumbnail of the welcome message (Variables: $user, $user_icon)
feature.settings.command.welcome.image.d: Set the image in the welcome message (Variables: $user, $user_icon)
feature.settings.command.welcome.color.d: Set the color of the welcome message (Variables: $user, $user_icon)

feature.embed.command.desc: Allows users to create custom embeds

feature.embed.command.thumbnail: Set the thumbnail of the embed
feature.embed.command.url: Set the url of the embed
feature.embed.command.fields: Add custom fields to the embed - Format: <inline (y/n)>##<title>##<content>; ...
feature.embed.command.color: Set the color of the embed - Format: #RRGGBB
feature.embed.command.timestamp: If set to true, a timestamp will be added
feature.embed.command.links: Add link buttons to the embed - Format: <label>##<link>; ...

feature.tickets.command.desc: Allows you to open tickets to the server staff

feature.default_roles.command.desc: Allows you to set roles every user automatically receives when they join the guild
feature.default_roles.command.list.desc: Returns a list with all default roles

There are currently no default roles enabled.

feature.default_roles.command.remove.suc: Successfully removed $0 to the default roles!
feature.activities.command.desc: Allows users to mark themself as interested in activities and find others based on activities
feature.activities.command.add.desc: Add a new activity to the recommendation list
feature.activities.command.add.name.desc: The name of the activity to add
feature.activities.command.remove.desc: Remove an activity from the recommendation list

feature.activities.command.interest.desc: Mark yourself as interested in a given activity
feature.activities.command.interest.name: The name of the activity
feature.activities.command.interest.succ: You are now set to be interested in **$0**
feature.activities.command.ignore.desc: Mark yourself as uninterested in a activity
feature.activities.command.ignore.succes: You are no longer set to be interested in **$0**
feature.activities.command.start.desc: Notify members interested in an activity
feature.activities.command.list.desc: Returns a list of activity recommendations

feature.activities.modal.custom.title: Set to custom activity

feature.activities.modal.start.title: Start activity
feature.activities.notification.title: New activity notification!
